Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: 4 Km of trail is open on top of Nub's Nob, (upper Red Loop).  Access is only available via Valley road (past Chestnut Valley Golf Course) as snow making is in operation on the alpine slopes.  No skiing on slopes!Skating was good yesterday and grooming is ongoing in preparation of 12" of new snow expected tonight.  Passes may be purchased at the main lodge.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: I am happy to report that conditions are almost perfect. Sunny - no wind - mid 20's. Oh sure the base is a bit thin - but the temp makes it fine. They have pulled a roller around the golf course and other trails. We skied the Cedar Trace and Buck's Run. We also saw that they just turned on a snow gun.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are being packed today. Not open for skiing as we prepare trails.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob is closed today as we focus on snowmaking. We will be open for skiing and riding December 6 and 7 from 9 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. for our first two days of the ski season. Thanks to the Nub's Nob Snow Farmers and some natural snow we should be in very good shape for this opening weekend. Stay tuned for more details including a run count over the next few days. See you on the slopes next weekend!
